sentences.en: " Come down and meet me to morrow, " he said, " and we'll go to the matinee.
sentences.cn: “ 明天到市中心来见我, 好吗? " 他说, " 我们一起去看下午场的戏.

sentences.en: " I've been to the matinee this afternoon. "
sentences.cn: " 我今天下午去看过戏了. ”

sentences.en: After school we escorted our teacher downtown in a body to a special matinee.
sentences.cn: 放学后,大家又一起簇拥着老师到镇中心观看日场电影.

sentences.en: B : Yes , sir. We have a matinee every Wednesday and Saturday.
sentences.cn: 是的, 先生, 我们每星期三和星期六都有一场日场.

sentences.en: By the way , will it be an evening performance or a matinee?
sentences.cn: 奥:我想问一问, 是夜场还是日场!

sentences.en: Dressing, after the matinee on Wednesday, a knock came at her dressing - room door.
sentences.cn: 星期三, 演完日戏之后,她正在换装, 听到有人敲她的化妆室的门.

sentences.en: I have ticket reserved for today's matinee.
sentences.cn: 预订了今天白天的戏票.

sentences.en: In fact I am not interested in matinee show.
sentences.cn: 事实上,我对日场并不感兴趣.

sentences.en: Jane at the box office I have tickets reserved for today's matinee.
sentences.cn: 简在售票处)我预订了今天日场的票.

sentences.en: Let's go see matinee movies and save a few bucks.
sentences.cn: 我们去看早场的电影省几块钱吧.

sentences.en: Let's go to see matinee movies and save a few bucks.
sentences.cn: 我们去看早场的电影,省几块钱吧.

sentences.en: Rudolph Valentino was the matinee idol of his day.
sentences.cn: 鲁道夫·瓦伦蒂诺是他那个时代使女性倾倒的男明星.

sentences.en: We are selling out for the evening performance, but there's a matinee.
sentences.cn: 夜场已经客满, 不过还有一场日场.

sentences.en: We have nothing at all left for today's matinee.
sentences.cn: 今天日场的票全售完了.

sentences.en: We have tickets for the matinee, It'starts at 3 p.m.
sentences.cn: 我们有日场的票卖, 下午3点钟开始.

trans.tran_cn: （剧场、影院等的）午后的演出，午场
